subject: Wire SMS delivery nodes in Job Reminder and Review Request workflows
description: Tasks 4.1-4.3, 5.1-5.3: Add HTTP Request nodes to Job Reminder and Review Request workflows that POST to Rewst redirect gateway (https://n8n.atgfw.com/webhook/rewst-n8n-redirect-wrapper) with appropriate action, conditional skip when empty, and gateway headers (X-Rewst-Webhook-Url, X-Rewst-Secret).
